content: It pains me that I now live in a world where a writer would actually write this sentence in complete seriousness. Let me help you…Pepsi actually believes that you should want to drink more Pepsi. That’s the point of this ad. That’s the point of EVERY one of their ads for at least the last 120 years. Also, if the executives at PepsiCo thought that a commercial involving a white guy in a pink tutu drowning cute puppies in a bucket of Lukewarm Pepsi would sell more Pepsi…than that is the commercial you would get.
